pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/DBZ-1824
The fix goes against processing heartbeat logic - it has to be reconciled with it yet.

nodes.bodyText: That sounds a bit concerning. Are you planning to follow up on this? Anything we should put into the docs?
Can you add a comment why only on COMMIT it's skipped?
